definition: to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette
to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia

sentences.english: The picture was painted by Picasso.
sentences.chinese: 这幅图画是毕卡索所绘。

sentences.english: It's like you have a Picasso or a an other Da Vinci.
sentences.chinese: 就像你手上带著毕卡索或是达文西一样。

sentences.english: He was the Minotaur in a canvas-and-paper labyrinth of his own construction.
sentences.chinese: 毕卡索在自己设计的迷宫内是画布上的人身牛头怪。

definition: Leonardo da Vinci (1452-1519), Italian Renaissance painter
Vincent Van Gogh (1853-1890), Dutch post-Impressionist painter (Tw)
Michelangelo Buonarroti (1475-1564), Renaissance painter and sculptor
Jean Auguste Dominique Ingres (1780-1867), French Neoclassical painter
